bug.short_desc: Move code used in different applications into separate libraries

long_desc.thetext:
Currently, we have some demos / code pieces in three different applications e.g. the form demo in: - the demobrowser - the showcase - the widget browser
We should move exactly those code pieces into separate libraries so that we don't have to maintain the same code three times.
A good place for putting such libraries would be "component/libraries".

I did what the previous comment already described, I created a new folder in the component folder called "library" (not libraries) and added three libraries there.
1. The from demo showing all available form elements. This is used in the showcase, the demo browser and the widget browser. 2. The twitter demo which is used in the showcase and in the demo browser. 3. The log of our applications. This is used in the testrunner, the playground and in the demobrowser.
trunk: r27487 - r27498

After some discussion in the team, we decided to move the libraries into a common name space called qxc.
